SEARCH
Package com.walletapp.dao

Class DashboardDAO

java.lang.Object
com.walletapp.dao.DashboardDAO
public class DashboardDAO extends Object
The DashboardDAO class handles all database interactions related to the dashboard view. It provides summarized financial data such as total income, expense, and balances across accounts for a specific user.

This class supports both global-level and account-level data aggregation, including category-wise summaries, balance calculations, and dynamic date filtering.

It uses DBUtil for establishing database connections.

Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sayan

  • Method Details

    • getAccountMetrics

      public List<DashboardDAO.AccountMetrics> getAccountMetrics(int userId, Date fromDate, Date toDate) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of DashboardDAO.AccountMetrics for all accounts belonging to the user. The results include account details, total income, total expense, and computed balance.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      fromDate - Optional filter start date.
      toDate - Optional filter end date.
      Returns:
      A list of DashboardDAO.AccountMetrics objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getCategoryTotalsForUser

      public Map<Integer,Map<String,Map<String,BigDecimal>>> getCategoryTotalsForUser(int userId, Date fromDate, Date toDate) throws SQLException
      Returns category totals grouped by account and record type (Income/Expense).
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID.
      fromDate - Optional start date filter.
      toDate - Optional end date filter.
      Returns:
      Nested map structure: Map<accountId, Map<recordType, Map<category, total>>>
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getSummary

      public Map<String,BigDecimal> getSummary(int userId, Date fromDate, Date toDate) throws SQLException
      Computes the global income, expense, and net total for the user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID.
      fromDate - Optional start date.
      toDate - Optional end date.
      Returns:
      A map containing keys: "income", "expense", and "net".
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.
